summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.4°C) and outside temperature (up 1.8°C).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 102 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 20 miles), dew point temperature (up 3.4°C), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and outside temperature (up 2.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 101.5m lower than yesterday, 53.2m higher than past week, 93.6m higher than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 412m and a high of 1807m, averaging 951.9m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and winds should remain light. Possible light showers, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and bright intervals likely. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
